content: I'm sitting on a plane off to Aganoa retreat in Samoa for a week for a surfing holiday with friends. I have my iPad, and apparently there is internet access, but I'll only be online occasionally and just keeping track of the big issues. I'll be accepting bug reports with my server, but I can't do anything other than restart it from Samoa. See you all in a week's time....
Have a great week in Samoa. By the looks of it, it must be paradise. Too bad they have internet access ;-)
Hope you have a great time in the sunshine and waves!
Hmm - don't you put any ideas in my head as to the theme of next years calendar (or poster, or puzzle, or whatever else we think of next) ;-)
